Race.SpecificTitle: PW-Law Enforcement Dist. -- 1% S&U Tax Renewal - Sheriff
Race.SummaryText:
Law Enforcement District Proposition
(Sales Tax Renewal)

Summary: A one percent (1%) sales and use tax renewal to fund salaries and related
benefits for employees of the Grant Parish Sheriff, and to fund the acquisition, lease,
operation and maintenance of vehicles, furniture, fixtures and equipment for the Grant
Parish Sheriff's Office.
Race.FullText:
Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of Grant, State of Louisiana (the
"District"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of one percent (1%) (the
"Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the
storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services
in the District, all as defined by law (an estimated $971,000 reasonably expected at this
time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) from and after the
termination of its current authorization (December 31, 2009), said Tax having been
previously authorized at elections held on October 2, 1994, July 18, 1998 and April 17,
2004, with the avails or proceeds of said Tax (after paying the reasonable and
necessary costs and expenses of administering and collecting the Tax) being dedicated
and expended for the purpose of (1) paying salaries and related benefits to employees
of the Grant Parish Sheriff; and (2) acquiring, leasing, operating and maintaining
vehicles, furniture, fixtures and equipment to be utilized by the Grant Parish Sheriff's
Office in carrying out its public duties?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury -- 10.9 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Library Tax Renewal)

Summary: 10 year, 10.9 mills property tax renewal for maintaining, supporting
and operating public libraries in Grant Parish.
Race.FullText:
Shall the Parish of Grant, State of Louisiana (the "Parish") levy a special tax of ten and
nine tenths (10.9) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated
$393,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an
entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with
the year 2019, for the purpose of maintaining, supporting and operating public libraries
in the Parish
